AssertionError.desc: Raised when the assert statement fails.

AttributeError.desc: Raised on the attribute assignment or reference fails.

EOFError.desc: Raised when the input() function hits the end-of-file condition.

FloatingPointError.desc: Raised when a floating point operation fails.

GeneratorExit.desc: Raised when a generator's close() method is called.

ImportError.desc: Raised when the imported module is not found.

IndexError.desc: Raised when the index of a sequence is out of range.

KeyError.desc: Raised when a key is not found in a dictionary.

KeyboardInterrupt.desc: Raised when the user hits the interrupt key (Ctrl+c or delete).

MemoryError.desc: Raised when an operation runs out of memory.

NameError.desc: Raised when a variable is not found in the local or global scope.

OSError.desc: Raised when a system operation causes a system-related error.

OverflowError.desc: Raised when the result of an arithmetic operation is too large to be represented.

ReferenceError.desc: Raised when a weak reference proxy is used to access a garbage collected referent.

RuntimeError.desc: Raised when an error does not fall under any other category.

StopIteration.desc: Raised by the next() function to indicate that there is no further item to be returned by the iterator.

SyntaxError.desc: Raised by the parser when a syntax error is encountered.

IndentationError.desc: Raised when there is an incorrect indentation.

TabError.desc: Raised when the indentation consists of inconsistent tabs and spaces.

SystemError.desc: Raised when the interpreter detects internal error.

TypeError.desc: Raised when a function or operation is applied to an object of an incorrect type.
TypeError.msg:
incorrect function or operation type
More Info at: https://github.com/justwaitfor-me/decode_things/tree/main/docs

UnboundLocalError.desc: Raised when a reference is made to a local variable in a function or method, but no value has been bound to that variable.

UnicodeError.desc: Raised when a Unicode-related encoding or decoding error occurs.

UnicodeEncodeError.desc: Raised when a Unicode-related error occurs during encoding.

UnicodeDecodeError.desc: Raised when a Unicode-related error occurs during decoding.

UnicodeTranslateError.desc: Raised when a Unicode-related error occurs during translation.

ValueError.desc: Raised when a function gets an argument of correct type but improper value.
ValueError.msg:
improper value for function
More Info at: https://github.com/justwaitfor-me/decode_things/tree/main/docs

ZeroDivisionError.desc: Raised when the second operand of a division or module operation is zero.
